person.persName: Charles P. Bacon (Trigg County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, physician. Christian County, Kentucky, native. Son of Charles A. Bacon and Susan Rowlett Bacon. Attended school in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned six enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Physician in Trigg County in 1860. Household owned fifteen enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860. Graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1861. Physician in Trigg County in 1863.
